title: Unhinged
summary: Rachel (Caren Pistorius) is running late to work when she has an altercation at a traffic light with a stranger (Crowe) whose life has left him feeling powerless and invisible. Soon, Rachel finds herself and everyone she loves the target of a man who decides to make one last mark upon the world by teaching her a series of deadly lessons. What follows is a dangerous game of cat and mouse that proves you never know just how close you are to someone who is about to become unhinged.

title: Mulan
summary: To save her ailing father from serving in the Imperial Army, a fearless young woman disguises herself as a man to battle northern invaders in China.

title: Tenet
summary: Christopher Nolan’s “Tenet” is an action epic evolving from the world of international espionage.

title: Antebellum
summary: Successful author Veronica Henley (Janelle Mona´e) finds herself trapped in a horrifying reality and must uncover the mind-bending mystery before it’s too late.

title: The New Mutants
summary: Five young mutants, just discovering their abilities while held in a secret facility against their will, fight to escape their past sins and save themselves.
